title: Programming Practical Skill Enhancement: Mobile Microlearning-Based Introductory Programming Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming concepts comprehension or office automation tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental programming concepts such as variables, conditionals, and loops through 5-minute microlearning content
Learners demonstrate conceptual application skills by achieving at least 80% accuracy in interactive quizzes delivered in mobile environments
Learners achieve at least a 30% improvement in programming comprehension compared to pre-course assessments by the end of the course
Learners can design one work automation script by applying microlearning techniques learned in real-time sessions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
